content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I searched for scientific studies on the potential environmental impact of treated nuclear wastewater in the Pacific Ocean and received several results, including articles from the National Geographic and the EPA. The Fukushima plant will take decades to decommission and a swath of land around the plant remains uninhabitable. Japan plans to release over a million tons of treated but still radioactive wastewater from the plant into the Pacific Ocean in two years, which has been criticized by the local fishing community, environmental groups, and Japan's neighbors. The water will be further treated and diluted, and the release will take decades to complete. Tokyo assures that the discharge will not pose a threat to people or the environment.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9659344/", "question": ""}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: discussing the concerns and recommendations for local community involvement and international collaboration in decision-making regarding the release of treated water from the Fukushima nuclear power plant into the ocean. The authors emphasize the importance of considering the perspectives of local stakeholders and incorporating social science perspectives into decision-making processes. The text also provides a reference list for resources related to nuclear safety and progress made since the Fukushima-Daiichi disaster.\n\nLinks: ['Skip to main content (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC9659344/#main-content)', '\\n\\n (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/)', 'Log in (https://account.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov?back_url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov%2Fpmc%2Farticles%2FPMC9659344%2F)', 'Dashboard (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/myncbi/)', 'Publications (https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/myncbi/collections/bibliography/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
